item.title: Lobsters Top Stories: Friday, March 14, 2025 at 6:20 PM UTC
item.description:
1. An introduction to Magit, an Emacs mode for Git (25 points | 15 comments)
2. Can we communally deprecate git checkout? (54 points | 72 comments)
3. A look at Firefox forks (18 points | 1 comment)
4. TinyKVM: The Fastest Sandbox (22 points | no comments)

6. did u ever read so hard u accidentally wrote? (8 points | no comments)
7. Recursion kills: The story behind CVE-2024-8176 / Expat 2.7.0 released, includes security fixes (15 points | 2 comments)
8. PAM unixsock (8 points | 1 comment)
9. Cursor told me I should learn coding instead of asking it to generate code (72 points | 15 comments)
10. That time I recreated Photoshop in C++ (2 points | no comments)
11. My Scammer Girlfriend: Baiting A Romance Fraudster (6 points | 1 comment)
12. Enhancing CA Practices: Key Updates in Mozilla Root Store Policy, v3.0 (8 points | 2 comments)
13. WebAssembly from the Ground Up – learn WASM by building a compiler (52 points | 24 comments)
14. Choosing Languages (110 points | 110 comments)
15. What Programming Concepts do you Struggle to Grok or Use in Production? (16 points | 27 comments)
16. coq-of-rust: Formal verification tool for Rust (6 points | 3 comments)
17. Decoding JSON sum types in Go without panicking (1 points | no comments)
18. Is your Rails application special? (3 points | no comments)
19. What are you doing this weekend? (3 points | 15 comments)
20. fsync() after open() is an elaborate no-op (10 points | 16 comments)
21. HashChain: A very fast online factor-based sublinear exact-matching string search algorithm (3 points | no comments)
22. Curry: A Truly Integrated Functional Logic Programming Language (21 points | 4 comments)
23. IO devices and latency (17 points | 2 comments)
24. Typestate Programming (7 points | 4 comments)
25. It’s Not As Simple As “Use A Memory Safe Language" - YouTube (2 points | no comments)
